author: A Google User
comment: Used to be fine, but it's getting worse! Only 3-5 profiles ( under activity) available in my area, notification unable to prompt when the apps is closed, unable to delete message at times.... Should bring back the "Online"

author: Heng Ratana
comment: The new update very limit of showing guys in DISTANCE section, while before I could see as many as and as far as I could scroll down. It's pretty disappointing. And please bring back the function which can search guy by location.

comment: Way too many fake profiles pretending to be army guys trying to scam you.

author: Noe Farias Jr
comment: There's a lot of fake guys that get on here that uses other people's pictures and names they give you phone numbers and tell you to call them and their Google numbers and I have been threatened by several different guys on here because I won't give them money this is a bad app for scammers Nigerian and Middle Easterns you need to filter a lot better I do not recommend this app to anybody

author: Super Stitious
comment: It's a good app. Would prefer to see those who have visited my profile in the last few days though

reply.author: ROMEO B.V.
reply.content: Hi there, could you let me know whether you are using the Store or UNCUT version of the app? You could send me an email to support@planetromeo.com with #AAPP747669 in the subject line, so that we can get to the bottom of this problem faster. I look forward to hearing from you. PR/Luke

author: Energy Engineer
comment: This app used to work fine earlier. I uninstalled it a few months back. A few days back I installed it again. Now I can not see any pics on any profile (not even my own).

1. While blocking the entire message history should also be deleted ...like in the Grinder app. 2. In a country like India where homosexuality is illegal and a crime with life imprisonment as punishment. ..it is unsafe and risky for us to make card or online payments for premium membership.

author: Sapiosexual Man
comment: Guys, don't waste your time on this trash! The app is full of defunct profiles and the only messages you'll get are from scam artists claiming to be in Syria with peace keeping mission.

I loved it and I met people, with good hearted  who never had sex but he love me n respect me more n that's more important to me love you so much for this app n showing my real face now I'm going to uninstall n going Los Angeles n getting married my love of life Victor thank you for connecting people

author: FuJie Kang
comment: Been on a little over a week and 90% of contacts and profiles are scam artists! Problem is this app let's you override the GPS location and assign a fake location near you.

author: Richad Astonish
comment: I cannot block or report someone who initially blocked me first. He is a bully and he block, and yet I cannot block him.

reply.author: ROMEO B.V.
reply.content: Hi there, if a user has already blocked you, you can block him by going to PLANETROMEO (www.planetromeo.com). From there, search for his profile name, open it, then tap 'Toggle right to block or left to unblock.'
